bibl.title: Callimachus' Hymn 5 and an Alexandrian Audience.
bibl.note: Portion of a work toward a book in progress on the ritual and civic relevance of Callimachus' Hymns. - 1. Mimetic Hymn and Alexandrian Audience. - 2. A Civic Focus. - 3. A Story for the Maidens: The Tale of Chariclo. - 4. Back to Argos. - 5. Back to Alexandria.
bibl.seg: Keyne Cheshire, Callimachus' Hymn 5 and an Alexandrian Audience.
M.A. Harder, R.F. Regtuit & G.C. Wakker (edd.), Hellenistic Poetry in Context = Hellenistica Groningana. 20 (Leuven, 2014) pp. 59-83.

Portion of a work toward a book in progress on the ritual and civic relevance of Callimachus' Hymns. - 1. Mimetic Hymn and Alexandrian Audience. - 2. A Civic Focus. - 3. A Story for the Maidens: The Tale of Chariclo. - 4. Back to Argos. - 5. Back to Alexandria.
